entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High plus 4. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early this morning. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud this afternoon. High plus 4. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Wednesday 26 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Clearing. Low minus 7.
entry.summary: Clearing this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 7. Wind chill minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Wednesday 26 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Rain. High plus 5.
